languages.text: "Так просто говорите мне, что собираетесь изменять с другим?"

traits.locale_text: "Так просто говорите мне, что собираетесь изменять с другим мужчиной?"

languages.text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"
languages.original_text: "Так просто говорите мне, что собираетесь изменять с другим?"

traits.locale_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"
"So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"
"So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"
"So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"
"So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

languages.text: “所以，你只是想随随便便地告诉我，你不打算对我忠贞不渝？”
languages.original_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

traits.locale_text: “所以，你只是想随随便便地告诉我，你不打算对我忠贞不渝？”

languages.text: "So lasst Ihr mich also ganz beiläufig wissen, dass Ihr nicht vorhabt, mir treu zu bleiben?"
languages.original_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

traits.locale_text: "So lasst Ihr mich also ganz beiläufig wissen, dass Ihr nicht vorhabt, mir treu zu bleiben?"

languages.text: « C'est donc votre façon de m'informer que vous ne comptez pas me rester fidèle ? »
languages.original_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc votre façon de m'informer que vous ne comptez pas me rester fidèle ? »

languages.text: «¿Así que esta es su forma de informarme de que no tiene intención de serme fiel?».
languages.original_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Así que esta es su forma de informarme de que no tiene intención de serme fiel?».

languages.text: 「これは、あなたが私に誠実であり続けるつもりではないということを、不用意に私に知らせる方法ですか？」
languages.original_text: "So this is your way of casually informing me that you do not intend to remain faithful to me?"

traits.locale_text: 「これは、あなたが私に誠実であり続けるつもりではないということを、不用意に私に知らせる方法ですか？」
